text: Hey folks - if you're a technical designer type, have a solid UX design portfolio, and want to work with a well-resourced team, check out this job at Betterment. <https://boards.greenhouse.io/betterment/jobs/3485080?gh_jid=3485080> - Reports into our Design organization (h/t <@U01SVUR9M9D>), so you'll be surrounded by a really solid design culture. You'll also be working alongside on awesome creative team.
